title: October 29, 2019: Zilliqa (ZIL): Down 5.56%
text:
Zilliqa: What’s the Latest Regarding its Price?

At the time of this writing, Zilliqa has a price of $0.005755 USD, which puts it down by approximately 5.56% from yesterday. The down day for Zilliqa yesterday was a reversal from the day before it, which puts its price at 5.52% above its 20 day moving average. Over the past two weeks, price has been in a unclear trend. Zilliqa’s expected trading range — as forecasted by the Bollinger bands indicator, which determines a range based on momentum and volatility over the past two weeks — is between $0.004746 and $0.006162. Given its boundaries, rangebound traders may find it compelling to entertain selling, as we are nearer to the top of the range.

Trade Zilliqa (ZIL) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The market capitalization of Zilliqa, or the amount of US dollars it would take to buy up all the circulating coins, is currently estimated to be $49 million.

Daily Engagement Metrics Update

Yesterday saw 18 transfers amongst holders of Zilliqa. As for the number of holders, yesterday saw the number of wallets holding Zilliqa rise by 0. To provide context, we’d rank this token as 25 out of the 32 Ethereum tokens in our index based on percentage growth in engagement over the past 7 days.

How are the Strong Holders of Zilliqa Faring?

In terms of wealth concentration, the richest 1,000 wallets own 98.14% of the coin’s total money supply. The percent of the currency that is owned by wallets that are both belonging to exchanges and in the top 1,000 richest wallets of the token comes out to 3.91% of the currency’s money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by -0.02% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by 0.15%.

Technical Development Status

In terms of how active the software development team working on Zilliqa is, it may be worth observing that the last time any work pertaining to code was done on their GitHub code repository was on October 28, 2019, or approximately 1 days before. To understand how code development is progressing, we can observe growth rates over the past 30 days in the number of open issues and the number of watchers: open issuers have been growing at about 0.43 per day, while the number of followers watching Zilliqa’s repositories is growing by 1.6.

The Latest on Zilliqa and Social Media

Twitter appears to be the most popular place to follow the company, and thus may be worth monitoring. Use this link to follow Zilliqa on Twitter.

Where to Buy

You can trade Zilliqa, listed under the symbol ZIL, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX, Ethfinex.

Article by SixJupiter
